verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֡וא <S%H1931><s%> he שָׁלַ֡ח <S%H7971><s%> sent מְרֹדַ֣ךְ בַּ֠לְאֲדָן <S%H4757><s%> Merodachbaladan בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בַּלְאֲדָ֧ן <S%H1081><s%> of Baladan מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon סְפָרִ֥ים <S%H5612><s%> letters וּמִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> and a present אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> to Hezekiah וַיִּשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> for he had heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חָלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> that he had been sick וַֽיֶּחֱזָֽק׃ <S%H2388><s%> and was recovered

וַיִּשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> was glad עֲלֵיהֶם֮ <S%H5921><s%> and חִזְקִיָּהוּ֒ <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah וַיַּרְאֵ֣ם <S%H7200><s%> of them and shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> them the house [נְכֹתָה כ] (נְכֹתֹ֡ו <S%H5238><s%> precious things ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּסֶף֩ <S%H3701><s%> the silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַזָּהָ֨ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּשָׂמִ֜ים <S%H1314><s%> and the spices וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> הַשֶּׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ointment הַטּ֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and the precious וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and his whole בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house כֵּלָ֔יו <S%H3627><s%> of his armour וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that was נִמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> and all that was found בְּאֹֽצְרֹתָ֑יו <S%H214><s%> in his treasures לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> there was דָבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> there was nothing אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הֶרְאָ֧ם <S%H7200><s%> shewed חִזְקִיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2396><s%> that Hezekiah בְּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4474><s%> dominion

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> Then came יְשַׁעְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3470><s%> Isaiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אָמְר֣וּ ׀ <S%H559><s%> unto him What said הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> another הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וּמֵאַ֙יִן֙ <S%H370><s%> where יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> they unto thee? And Hezekiah מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country רְחוֹקָ֛ה <S%H7350><s%> from a far בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> They are come אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> from מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> unto me [even] from Babylon

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> he What have they seen בְּבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> All that [is] in mine house וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered חִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> is in בְּבֵיתִי֙ <S%H1004><s%> house רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> have they seen לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> there is nothing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הִרְאִיתִ֖ים <S%H7200><s%> that I have not shewed בְּאוֹצְרֹתָֽי׃ <S%H214><s%> among my treasures

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3470><s%> Isaiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2396><s%> to Hezekiah שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

הִנֵּה֮ <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> Behold the days בָּאִים֒ <S%H935><s%> come וְנִשָּׂ֣א ׀ <S%H5375><s%> shall be carried כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> is in בְּבֵיתֶ֗ךָ <S%H1004><s%> that all that [is] in thine house וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after אָצְר֧וּ <S%H686><s%> have laid up in store אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> and [that] which thy fathers עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> until this day הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> to this בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> to Babylon לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִוָּתֵ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> shall be left דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> nothing אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וּמִבָּנֶ֜יךָ <S%H1121><s%> And of thy sons אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יֵצְא֧וּ <S%H3318><s%> that shall issue מִמְּךָ֛ <S%H4480><s%> at אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom תּוֹלִ֖יד <S%H3205><s%> from thee which thou shalt beget יִקָּ֑חוּ <S%H3947><s%> shall they take away וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> will become סָרִיסִ֔ים <S%H5631><s%> and they shall be eunuchs בְּהֵיכַ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> in the palace מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said חִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְשַׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> to Isaiah ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Good דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [is] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֑רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> which thou hast spoken וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> He said כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יִהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> moreover For there shall be peace וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> and truth בְּיָמָֽי׃ <S%H3117><s%> in my days פ
